job.title: System Engineer
job.description: Job Title: System Engineer (Office 365, Powershell Scripting & Active Directory) Location: San Jose, CA or PST/West Coast Duration: 6 Months Duties: 1. User Support and Development - Two parts: Scripting automations and answering user ticket 2. Tickets can range from automation requests to assisting with O365 access. Experience: 1. O365 2. Powershell Scripting 3. Active Directory Nice to Have: OKTA Google Workspace Microsoft Technologies Working in Active Directory Tools and Programs: O365 – Suite of Microsoft applications – Outlook, Excel, Word, etc. PowerShell Language for automation – Scripting Active Directory Experience . If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume at anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com or call me at (925) 218-2347 . Looking forward to hearing from you!
